# ScalingWebs

> ScalingWebs is a web design and SEO agency based in Tallinn, Estonia, serving businesses across the Baltic region (Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania). We specialize in building high-performance websites optimized for search engine visibility and conversion.

## Legal Entity

- Company: EFFI AI SOLUTIONS OÜ
- Registry Code: 17306855
- Address: Pärnu mnt 15, 10141 Tallinn, Estonia
- Registry: https://www.inforegister.ee/en/17306855-EFFI-AI-SOLUTIONS-OU/

## Core Services

- **Free Website Design Preview**: We design a custom homepage for your business at no cost. You only pay if you want to proceed.
- **SEO Optimization**: Keyword analysis, content creation, technical SEO, and on-page optimization to grow organic traffic.
- **Website Redesign**: Full website rebuilds with modern design, fast load times, and conversion-optimized layouts.
- **E-commerce Development**: Online store setup with SEO-first architecture for maximum product visibility.

## Founders

- **Romet Ridamäe** — Co-Founder | https://www.linkedin.com/in/romet-ridamae/
- **Marti Suvorov** — Co-Founder | https://www.linkedin.com/in/marti-suvorov-12aa0628b/

## Case Studies (Proven Results)

- **Rüki Gallery (rukigalerii.ee)**: 2x organic traffic growth within one year. 76% of total traffic from SEO. Google TOP 5 for key art-related keywords. 64% more clicks from search results.
- **Premium Watches (premiumkellad.ee)**: 3.4x increase in SEO-driven revenue. 60% of traffic and 55% of sales from organic search.
- **Tark Pere (tarkpere.ee)**: 2.8x organic traffic growth. 85% of all traffic from search. 300+ monthly Google visits 1.5 years after a one-time SEO project. TOP 5 for "couples therapy" and "family counseling" in Tallinn.

## Target Market

Baltic businesses (Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania) seeking professional web design and SEO services. Primary language: English. Service area: Tallinn, Riga, Vilnius, and surrounding regions.

## Technology Partners

Make, Mixpanel, Netlify, SendGrid, Stripe, Supabase, Vercel, Zoom
